FuncDef: This command displays the HQoS aggregate rate limit per SAP or encap group.

ParaDef.Info: The port number and encapsulation value used to identify the SAP.
Displays egress SAP customer scheduler stats.
Specifies the name of the encap-group and can be up to 32 ASCII characters.
Specifies the value of the single encap-id. Values-1 to 16777215.
